title: Sales Trend Analysis
description: Act like a pro data analyst. Analyze Sales_Q1.csv for trend analysis and produce a bar chart; output as XLSX.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>Sales Trend Analysis</title>
  <role>Act like a pro data analyst</role>
  <task>Analyze the dataset and generate visual output</task>

  <request>
    <task>AnalyzeData</task>
    <dataset>Sales_Q1.csv</dataset>
    <analysis type="TrendAnalysis"/>
    <visualization>BarChart</visualization>
    <output format="xlsx"/>
  </request>
</prompt>
